alert.note: Alert for Bent (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:24PM MDT until June 06 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MDT FOR NORTHERN BENT COUNTY... At 523 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Las Animas to near John Martin Reservoir, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Las Animas, Hasty, McClave, John Martin Reservoir, Fort Lyon and Caddoa. This includes portions of Highway 50 in Bent County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
